reviewText: it maybe old and our graphics are better now but it is still a very good movie to watch.
This is a far above average anime with character designs by the legendary Haruhiko Mikimoto (Macross, Orguss, Gunbuster, and many others).  It has an intriguing story and beautiful effects.
This is a wonderful movie. I highly recommend it to everyone. It is full of wonder and beautiful animation that will awe you. The story line will keep you watching till the end. Enjoy!
